summary.description: Database containing 4.373 video, 18.212 still images and 7.771 labels concerning sampled that were prepared and stored from 1910 at the “Stazione Zoologica Anton Dohrn di Napoli (SZN)”. Moreover, the digitised version of 38 documents (totalling 8406 pages) with important information about taxonomy, ecology and phylogenetic is also included.
summary.name: SZN Zoological Collection Database
